A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is one of the best Star Wars movies since Empire\, with amazing special effects\, good characters\, great acting\, and some exciting twists and turns. However\, it's not perfect. There are some problems\, like the B plot on Kantobyte (not sure how to spell it)\, which wasn't essential because (spoilers) the guy turns on them and they never hack the ship at any point. There's also some characters who die too soon (preferably Captain Phasma). Other than that\, it's also the funniest. With an amazing performance by Mark Hamil\, moviegoers and casual fans alike will enjoy this one.
